name: DUNGEONS: Goblins and Dragons
description:
I'M WORK IN HTML5 VERSION

Please, if there is any bug or error please put it in the comments like this:

1-What happened?

2-What did you expect to happen?

3-What did you do before it happened?

Thanks

CONTROLS:

WASD--Move

Left click--Attack

Right click--Use potions or Keys

Shift--Run
